net.callumtaylor.asynchttp.response
Class AsyncHttpResponseHandler

java.lang.Object
  net.callumtaylor.asynchttp.response.AsyncHttpResponseHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryResponseHandler, ImageResponseHandler, JsonResponseHandler, StringResponseHandler
public abstract class AsyncHttpResponseHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This is the base class for response handlers in AsyncHttpClient. The method flow is as follows: 

 onSend -> onPublishedUploadProgress -> onPublishedDownloadProgress -> beforeCallback -> onSuccess/onFailure -> beforeFinish -> onFinish
onPublishedDownloadProgress, onPublishedUploadProgress, beforeCallback, onSuccess, and onFailure all run in the bacgkround thread. All your processing should be handled in one of those 4 methods and then either call to run on UI thread a new runnable, or handle in onFinish which runs on the UI thread

public AsyncHttpResponseHandler()
Method Detail

getConnectionInfo

public ConnectionInfo getConnectionInfo()

onSend

public void onSend()
Called when the connection is first made

onPublishedDownloadProgress

public void onPublishedDownloadProgress(byte[] chunk,
                                        int chunkLength,
                                        long totalLength)
Called when a chunk has been downloaded from the request. This will be called once every chunk request, and once extra when all the content is downloaded.

Parameters:
chunk - The chunk of data. This will be the null after the total amount has been downloaded.
chunkLength - The length of the chunk
totalLength - The total size of the request. note: This can be -1 during download.

onPublishedDownloadProgress

public void onPublishedDownloadProgress(byte[] chunk,
                                        int chunkLength,
                                        long totalProcessed,
                                        long totalLength)
Called when a chunk has been downloaded from the request. This will be called once every chunk request, and once extra when all the content is downloaded.

Parameters:
chunk - The chunk of data. This will be the null after the total amount has been downloaded.
chunkLength - The length of the chunk
totalProcessed - The total amount of data processed from the request.
totalLength - The total size of the request. note: This can be -1 during download.

onPublishedDownloadProgressUI

public void onPublishedDownloadProgressUI(long totalProcessed,
                                          long totalLength)
Runs on the UI thread. Useful for updating progress bars.

Parameters:
totalProcessed - The total processed sized of the request
totalLength - The total length of the request

onPublishedUploadProgress

public void onPublishedUploadProgress(byte[] chunk,
                                      int chunkLength,
                                      long totalLength)
Called when a chunk has been uploaded to the request. This will be called once every chunk request

Parameters:
chunk - will be the total byte array when this is called.
chunk - The chunk of data
chunkLength - The length of the chunk
totalLength - The total size of the request.

onPublishedUploadProgress

public void onPublishedUploadProgress(byte[] chunk,
                                      int chunkLength,
                                      long totalProcessed,
                                      long totalLength)
Called when a chunk has been uploaded to the request. This will be called once every chunk request

Parameters:
chunk - will be the total byte array when this is called.
chunk - The chunk of data
chunkLength - The length of the chunk
totalProcessed - The total amount of data processed from the request.
totalLength - The total size of the request.

onPublishedUploadProgressUI

public void onPublishedUploadProgressUI(long totalProcessed,
                                        long totalLength)
Runs on the UI thread. Useful for updating progress bars.

Parameters:
totalProcessed - The total processed sized of the request
totalLength - The total length of the request

beforeCallback

public void beforeCallback()
Called just before onSuccess

onSuccess

public abstract java.lang.Object onSuccess()
Processes the response from the stream. This is not ran on the UI thread

Returns:
The modified data set, or null

onFailure

public java.lang.Object onFailure()
Called when a response was not 2xx.

Returns:
The modified data set, or null

beforeFinish

public void beforeFinish()
Called before onFinish

onFinish

public void onFinish()
Called when the streams have all finished, success or not
